data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xie, Hongyan, Cunningham, Saul A., Yeates, David K., Thompson, F. Christian (2014): A new sericomyiine flower fly from China (Diptera: Syrphidae). Zootaxa 3860 (1): 81-86, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3860.1.4
